text: Is tarah lāzim hai ki āp jo shauhar haiṅ samajh ke sāth apnī bīwiyoṅ ke sāth zindagī guzāreṅ, yih jān kar ki yih āp kī nisbat kamzor haiṅ. Un kī izzat kareṅ, kyoṅki yih bhī āp ke sāth zindagī ke fazl kī wāris haiṅ. Aisā na ho ki is meṅ beparwāī karne se āp kī duāiyā zindagī meṅ rukāwaṭ paidā ho jāe.
